seo.openGraphDescription: Step by step instructions for installing the YakShaver browser extension and using it

pageBlocks.tryItNowTitle: Start recording with the YakShaver browser extension in 3 steps!

tryItNowCards.title: 1. Download
tryItNowCards.description: Download  the YakShaver browser extension from the Google Chrome store by clicking the button below.

tryItNowCards.title: 2. Pin
tryItNowCards.description: Click the ![](/TryItNow/extension.svg) at the top right of your browser, then the ![](/TryItNow/pin.svg) next to YakShaver to pin it to your browser window.

tryItNowCards.title: 3. Start Recording
tryItNowCards.description: Click on the YakShaver Logo ![](/TryItNow/yakshaver.svg) at the top of  your browser window, then click Start Recording.
